record.title-alt-script: אלענדארפ'ס מעטהאדע זיך גרונדליך אויסצולערנען דיא ענגלישע שפאך אהן א לעהרער
record.title: Olendorf's meṭhode zikh grindlikh oystsulernen di Englishe shprakh ohn a lehrer = Ollendorff's method to acquire a thorough knowledge of the English language without the aid of a teacher
record.creator: Harkavy, Alexander, 1863-1939
Ollendorff, H. G. (Heinrich Gottfried), 1803-1865
record.subject: English language
